Method Detail

getDocuments

ca.odell.glazedlists.EventList getDocuments()
Gets the list of open documents.

Returns:
the list of open documents

getDocumentForFile

DocumentItem getDocumentForFile(File file)
Gets the document for the given file. If there is no document open for the given file, this method returns null.

Parameters:
file - the file for which to look for an open document
Returns:
the DocumentItem containing the file's content or null if there is none

getSelectedDocument

DocumentItem getSelectedDocument()
Gets the currently selected document. This method returns null if there is no currently selected document.

Returns:
the currently selected document or null if there is no document selected

setSelectedDocument

void setSelectedDocument(DocumentItem item)
Sets the currently selected document.

getDirtyDocuments

ca.odell.glazedlists.EventList getDirtyDocuments()
Gets a list containing all the dirty documents.

Returns:
the list of dirty documents

newDocument

void newDocument()
Creates a new untitled document.

openDocument

void openDocument(File file)
                  throws IOException
Opens the given file in a new editor document.

Parameters:
file - the file to open
Throws:
IOException - if the exception fails

saveDocument

void saveDocument(DocumentItem item)
                  throws IOException
Saves the given document to the associated file. It is an error to call this method with an item that has never been saved before.

Parameters:
item - the document to save
Throws:
IOException - if there is a problem saving the document
IllegalArgumentException - if the item is null or has not been saved
See Also:
DocumentItem.hasBeenSaved()

saveDocumentAs

void saveDocumentAs(File file,
                    DocumentItem item,
                    boolean copy)
                    throws IOException
Saves a document into a new file. The file will be overwritten if it exists. The file is associated with the item, further calls to saveDocument(DocumentItem) save the document to the new file. If the copy parameter is false, the file property of the item is set to the new file. Otherwise it is left as it is.

Parameters:
file - where to save the document
item - the document item to save
copy - whether this saveDocumentAs call should create a copy
Throws:
IOException - in case of IO problems

closeDocument

void closeDocument(DocumentItem item,
                   boolean shutdown)
Closes the given document item. Unsaved changes will be discarded, so be careful to ask the user for confirmation. If the document has been published, it is concealed.

Parameters:
item - the document to close

closeAllDocuments

void closeAllDocuments()
Closes all documents. The documents are concealed first if they were published.

publishDocument

void publishDocument()
Publishes the currently selected document.

concealDocument

void concealDocument()
Conceals the currently selected document.

joinSession

void joinSession(DocumentItem item)

leaveSession

void leaveSession()
